Become an Explorer!

VidyaVerse Campus Ambassador Program

You are a great fit, if?

Do you have what it takes to be an Explorer!

You have Hustle Mindset!

Are you a fan of grinding through work? Want to work in a startup full of mad-teenagers? If yes, this is your place to be!

You are a Task Juggler!

We believe in pushing ourselves to the best of our potentials each day. If you're this, then welcome to the mad gang of jugglers!

You are a Social Butterfly!

VidyaVerse's Campus Ambassador is someone who loves talking to people and building your network through socialising!

You want make a Change!

Do you also feel there's a lot we can improve in the educational structure in India, then come join the revolution with us!

Explorer = Hustler + Juggler + Mingler + Changemaker!

An Explorer's Checklist!

Throughout your journey, eliminate educational barriers, build communities, and create an impact!

Impact Students

Connect students with VidyaVerse and take one step further towards helping them learn quality skill-based education.

Organise Events

While working in small groups, organise offline and online events and conduct campaigns while learning marketing strategies with us.

Work with Schools

Work with schools and help them introduce VidyaVerse courses to students who want to take than extra step towards exploring new paths.

Build your Network

While you'll work with hundreds and thousands of students, you get a chance to build connections and inspire people.

What's the Process?

How to become a Campus Ambassador or as we say: An Explorer!

  1. 1

    Submit the Application Form!

  2. 2

    Undergo Selection Process

  3. 3

    Experience Induction Programme

  4. 4

    Begin Impacting Lives!

You get what you deserve!

At VidyaVerse, we work hard each day and party harder each quarter!

Various Levels of Incentives
Various Positions of Certificates
Personalised Recommendations
FREE VidyaVerse Courses, Books
Early Access to Merchandise
Subscriptions you need daily
Team Parties and offline Meetups
And so much more to cherish together!

VidyaVerse is a one-stop platform for teenagers to explore their passions, learn skills while in school, and become industry ready today. Start your journey today!
